resources.string: Enables analysis of app tracking by third-party companies.
Please give VPN permissions for TrackerControl to work.
DELETE your tracker history AND your tracker choices?
Shall this app contact external servers, notably Google, to retrieve the developer email and the privacy policy of an app?
No permission given to retrieve policy from external server. Change in app settings.
Use this wisely, since developers rely on it!
This action blocks advertising, upon which many developers rely. Continue?
Exported to storage! Access phone storage from computer or share with other app.
Could not parse their privacy policy.

Many apps send data to third-parties, so-called trackers. TrackerControl allows to block these network transmissions selectively. Yet, use this wisely, since app developers rely on these services, notably advertising.

As an alternative to complete blocking, Android offers a setting to limit the usage of personal data for analytics and advertising purposes. However, personal data may still be transmitted and therefore requires trust in the data-receiving companies.

The EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) allows users from the EU to manage any data related to them. This app provides email templates to reach out to the developer. The developer has to answer within one month.
If you think an application violates data protection principles, you may want to contact the responsible entities directly.
This is a setting of the Google Play Services, which were not found on yourr device.
Developer mail address not yet fetched. Check internet connection.

To Whom It May Concern:
I am invoking my right to erasure as specified in Article 17 of the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). I am requesting you, as the data controller of the Android app %s (ID: %s), to erase the following personal data it processes about me without undue delay: • All data.
The reason for my removal request is that I withdraw or have withdrawn my consent for processing the personal data. This request relates to any processing of my personal data by you, including any processors processing personal data on behalf of you.
Please provide your response through secure means by email. I look forward to receiving a response within one month of the receipt of my request.
Sincerely,
Sorry. TrackerControl just crashed.. Would you mind sending us an email with details?
Show all apps on the device
Email apps may stop functioning when enabled (app restart required).
To retrieve privacy policy and developer mail. No personal data is shared.
Toggle the switch and interact with some other apps. Private DNS must be disabled.
Toggle the switch and interact with some other apps.
